name: Serta_RTA_Martinique_Collection_61-inch_Navarre_Beige_Fabric_Loveseat_Sofa
reviews: This loveseat sofa is small, good quality and easy to assemble, quite comfortable I am happy with the loveseat but i feel it is to small for me cannot lay down on it so I will keep it and put up in my bedroom and search for a larger sofa, I hope I have helped others out there.
love this - relatively easy to put together - allow about an hour. adorable and sturdy-
description: From a brand synonymous with uncompromising quality, comfort and style, the Serta at Home Sofa2Go Navarre Collection Loveseat is a stunning complement to your contemporary decor. It's compact size and unique tool-free assembly design makes it a great seating solution for fitting into apartments, dorms, and other small spaces. This loveseat is made with quality hardwood materials that provide strength and stability for a sturdy and durable design. Poly-fibers and high-density foam surround individually wrapped coils to ensure comfortable, supportive seating. Pillowed back cushions retain their shape and density, so you won't lose that amazing feeling of sinking into relaxed comfort over time. As part of the Navarre Collection, this loveseat features straight arms and a loose cushion back with straight cushions for modern style.Set includes: One (1) loveseat, Two (2) pillowsIt comes wrapped in a beige polyester fabric and features square footers in a complementary espresso finish.Pair this loveseat with the matching Navarre Collection sofa to create a completely coordinated look.Premium S-coil for extra support, individually wrapped coils surrounded by high-density foam and quality poly-fibers for supportive seatingComes in one easily transportable compact box that is easy to maneuver up stairs and around cornersTool-free set up makes it simple to assemble and disassemble for easy movingPillowed back cushions feature a poly-fiber core and non-woven cover that retains shape and density for lasting comfortLoose cushions (non-reversible)Materials: Polyester fabric, metal, wood, foam, plasticFinish: EspressoUpholstery color: BeigeSeat dimensions: 20 inches high x 46 inches wide x 20.5 inches deepDimensions (overall): 35 inches high x 61 inches wide x 32.5 inches deepStyleContemporaryMaterialFoam, Metal, Plastic, Polyester, WoodTypeLoveseatAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeigeFurniture PatternSolid
